# UIModalTransitionStyle.coverVertical | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ UIKit ](/documentation/uikit)

-  UIModalTransitionStyle.coverVertical 

Case# UIModalTransitionStyle.coverVertical

iOSiPadOSMac CatalysttvOSvisionOS

```
case coverVertical
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/UIKit/UIModalTransitionStyle/coverVertical#Discussion)

When the view controller is presented, its view slides up from the bottom of the screen. On dismissal, the view slides back down. This is the default transition style.

## [See Also](/documentation/UIKit/UIModalTransitionStyle/coverVertical#see-also)
